div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1356 "Dalyan" (formerly Bunar Baschi; (172) anc. Alexandreia Troas), 1875 Burial: c. 90 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 100 AR Lysimachus: c. 50 tetradr. Nicomedes II-III: c. 30 tetradr. Mithradates VI: c. 15 tetradr. Ariarathes IX: 5 tetradr. Disposition: Berlin 1 Friedländer, ZfN 1877, p. 10 Mørkholm, NC 1962, p. 411
